TestedMethod.name: public Process exec(String[] cmdarray, String[] envp)

APITestDescription.Description:
The test is against exec1012 method. It exerecises the fillowing:
1) Executes the specified string command in a separate process.
For testing purposes JVM is used. The String[] envp argument contains the "java.home" property. The test performs the following checks on the method. The test performs the following checks on the method. - If a String[] argument contains both the "java" and the "-help" tokens, that is, the command to launch JVM is correct, the exit value returned on a process exit is 0. - If a String[] argument doesn't contain the "-help" token, that is, the command to launch JVM is incorrect, the exit value returned on a process exit is 1.
